creator: pcc@nuance.com
text:
The debug attribute of the <javac> element only permits "on" and "off" values, 
which map to -g and -g:none, respectively. In the modern compiler, -g allows 
options "lines", "vars", "source", options that should be specifiable by the 
build file.

creator: umagesh@rediffmail.com
text:
Created attachment 682
[PATCH] Javac recognizes debug levels when modern compiler is used. - Thanks, Magesh
Fixed in CVS.  NIghtly build on Nov 21 should have this.
creator: umagesh@apache.org
